member.name: T:WinCopies.Diagnostics.ComparisonType
member.summary: Comparison types for the If functions.

member.name: F:WinCopies.Diagnostics.ComparisonType.And
member.summary: Check if all conditions are checked.

member.name: F:WinCopies.Diagnostics.ComparisonType.Or
member.summary: Check if at least one condition is checked.

member.name: F:WinCopies.Diagnostics.ComparisonType.Xor
member.summary: Check if exactly one condition is checked.

member.name: T:WinCopies.Diagnostics.ComparisonMode
member.summary: Comparison modes for the If functions.

member.name: F:WinCopies.Diagnostics.ComparisonMode.Binary
member.summary: Use a binary comparison

member.name: F:WinCopies.Diagnostics.ComparisonMode.Logical
member.summary: Use a logical comparison

member.name: T:WinCopies.Diagnostics.Comparison
member.summary: Comparison to perform.

member.name: F:WinCopies.Diagnostics.Comparison.Equal
member.summary: Check for values equality

member.name: F:WinCopies.Diagnostics.Comparison.NotEqual
member.summary: Check for values non-equality

member.name: F:WinCopies.Diagnostics.Comparison.Lesser
member.summary: Check if a value is lesser than a given value. This field only works for methods that use lesser/greater/equal comparers.

member.name: F:WinCopies.Diagnostics.Comparison.LesserOrEqual
member.summary: Check if a value is lesser than or equal to a given value. This field only works for methods that use lesser/greater/equal comparers.

member.name: F:WinCopies.Diagnostics.Comparison.Greater
member.summary: Check if a value is greater than a given value. This field only works for methods that use lesser/greater/equal comparers.

member.name: F:WinCopies.Diagnostics.Comparison.GreaterOrEqual
member.summary: Check if a value is greater than or equal to a given value. This field only works for methods that use lesser/greater/equal comparers.

member.name: F:WinCopies.Diagnostics.Comparison.ReferenceEqual
member.summary: Check if an object reference is equal to a given object reference. This field only works for methods that use equality comparers (not lesser/greater ones).

member.name: M:WinCopies.Diagnostics.IfHelpers.If(WinCopies.Diagnostics.ComparisonType@,WinCopies.Diagnostics.ComparisonMode@,WinCopies.Diagnostics.Comparison@,System.Object@,System.Object[])
member.summary: Performs a comparison by testing a value compared to an array of values.
member.param: Whether to perform an 'and', 'or' or 'xor' comparison.
Whether to perform a binary or a logical comparison.
Whether to perform an equality or an inequality comparison, and, if to perform an inequality comparison, the type of the inequality comparison to perform.
The value to compare the values of the table with.
The values to compare.
member.returns: if the comparison has succeeded for all values, otherwise .

member.summary: Performs a comparison by testing a value compared to an array of values using a custom and .
member.param: Whether to perform an 'and', 'or' or 'xor' comparison.
Whether to perform a binary or a logical comparison.
Whether to perform an equality or an inequality comparison, and, if to perform an inequality comparison, the type of the inequality comparison to perform.
The comparer used to compare the values.
The value to compare with.
The values to compare.
The comparison predicate
member.returns: if the comparison has succeeded for all values, otherwise .
